thread.title: Syrian boys' bodies returned home for burial
thread.title_full: Syrian boys' bodies returned home for burial | News24

author: news24.com
title: Syrian boys' bodies returned home for burial
text:
Kucuk Kendirli - The Syrian man who survived a capsizing during a desperate voyage from Turkey to Greece has taken the bodies of his wife and two sons back to the Syrian Kurdish region they fled, to bury them in their hometown of Kobani.
The haunting image of the man's 3-year-old son, Aylan Kurdi, washed up on a Turkish beach focused the world's attention on the wave of migration fuelled by war and deprivation.
A convoy of vehicles crossed into Kobani from the Turkish border town of Suruc on Friday.
Legislators from Turkey accompanied Abdullah Kurdi to Kobani. Journalists and well-wishers were stopped at a checkpoint some 3 kilometres from the border.
